keyToStrMap.Full:
Drew the Drummer

Occupation:
[] Bongo player (previously shop keeper)

Likes:
[] Chilling out, drinking smoothies, dancing to the beat

Dislikes:
[] Bossy people

Favourite quote:
[] Go with the beat and dance like a crazy person!

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My twin sister

How I came to be here:
[] A nasty accident involving a tube of superglue

What I wish:
[] That I could dance on the ceiling
